mapper.select: select cart.id as cartId, cart.product_spec_id as productSpecId,ps.price as productPrice,p.name as productName, ps.spec_image_url as productImageUrl,p.summary,cart.quantity,ps.stock as stock from t_shopping_cart_product cart ,t_product_spec ps,t_product p where cart.product_spec_id=ps.id and ps.product_id=p.id and cart.user_id=#{userId}

select p.name as productName,p.summary as summary,ps.price as productPrice, scp.quantity,pi.image_url as productImageUrl, from t_shopping_cart_product scp,t_product_spec ps,t_product_image pi,t_product p where scp.product_spec_id=ps.id and ps.product_id=p.id and p.id=pi.product_id and ps.product_id=pi.product_id and pi.type='1' and scp.id in
#{cartId}
